column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou Malnati's is a staple in Chicago. You definitely need to eat deep dish pizza when visiting in Chicago
column2: and this is one of the best chains you can find. However
column3: at the location we went to
column5: the service was average to slow
column6: and the wings were great. I wouldn't attribute all Lou Malnati's to be this way
column7: but I also wouldn't say Lou M's is the all time best place to get your deep dish pizza fix.
